ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New song idea
ygData.msgSnippet: Very neat idea.  Though wiping the hate list will get it turned down.  I can see a LOT of uses for this song even without the hate list wipe.  What would be
ygData.messageBody:
Very neat idea. Though wiping the hate list will get it turned down. I can
see a LOT of uses for this song even without the hate list wipe. What would
be even more cool is if they let it summon all party members regardless of
zone. ;)

Interesting thought eh? ;)

Just my .02 cents. After all we're talking over 50
----- Original Message -----
From: "Jada" <JadaKost@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 21, 2000 1:46 PM
Subject: [eqbards] New song idea


> From: Jada <JadaKost@...>
>
> Trying to come up with a song that is
>
> 1) extremely powerful
> 2) no other class has
> 3) makes bards extremely wanted on raids (a la
> enchanters)
> 4) and has coding already built into the game
>
> I came up with a song that is the opposite of
> Melanie's Mellifluous Motion. A song that teleports
> all party members in the zone to the bards location.
>
> Name: Melanie's Call to Arms
>
> This song would be extremely useful in conjuction with
> a binding group leader. Imagine doing an Efreeti Raid
> in SolB and wanting to bring in other members since
> some need to leave. Instead of breaking through again
> the group leader would be bound at zoneline, group up
> the bard and gate back to his bindpoint. The group
> leader would then group up the 4 new members and the
> song would be sung and would teleport everyone back to
> the bard.
>
> There are a few problems with this that may make it
> too powerful. Such as Plane of Sky (never been
> myself) where this song could not be used to bypass
> the teleporters etc... Also this song may need to
> remove the party members from all hate lists or risk
> causing a hellish train through the zone.
>
> If it does remove everyone from hate list the song
> becomes MUCH more powerful (too powerful?) in that in
> Plane of Hate things go bad. The bard runs up the
> wall away from the fight and sings the song, everyone
> teleports up the bard and is removed from hate list.
> Therefore removing the need for clerics to camp out
> etc... This song combined with Selo's would make the
> bard extremely wanted in any group, but especially
> raids.
>
> The song may need to use up mana, although I really
> don't want all our songs using up mana.
>
> Please let me know what you all think. Its just an
> idea I came up with when I should be working =)
>
> Jada MacAldred
> Bard of Povar
>
>
